avg_numerator.__comment: Get all issues updated the last 90 days, that were in a sprint, and are not completed
avg_numerator.jql: project={{project}} AND sprint IN (closedSprints()) AND updated>endOfDay(-90d) AND status IN (Done,Resolved,Closed)

avg_denominator.__comment: Get all issues updated the last 90 days, that were in a sprint
avg_denominator.jql: project={{project}} AND sprint IN (closedSprints()) AND updated>endOfDay(-90d)
